pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū vutthavassā āraññakesu senāsanesu viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.1.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.1.7: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū—“bhagavatā anuññātaṃ āraññakesu senāsanesu viharantena tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitun”ti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.2: Tāni cīvarāni nassantipi vinassantipi ḍayhantipi undūrehipi khajjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.13: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.16: “Upavassaṃ kho pana kattikapuṇṇamaṃ yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanāni sāsaṅkasammatāni sappaṭibhayāni tathārūpesu bhikkhu senāsanesu viharanto ākaṅkhamāno tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipeyya, siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.17: Chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.5: Yāni kho pana tāni āraññakāni senāsanānīti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.9: ārāme ārāmūpacāre corānaṃ niviṭṭhokāso dissati, bhuttokāso dissati, ṭhitokāso dissati, nisinnokāso dissati, nipannokāso dissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.11: ārāme ārāmūpacāre corehi manussā hatā dissanti, viluttā dissanti, ākoṭitā dissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.17: saṅghāṭiṃ vā uttarāsaṅgaṃ vā antaravāsakaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.20: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo tena cīvarena vippavāsāyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.22: Chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.28: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.31: idaṃ me, bhante, cīvaraṃ atirekachārattaṃ vippavutthaṃ, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.36: Atirekachāratte atirekasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.37: Atirekachāratte vematiko vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.38: Atirekachāratte ūnakasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.44: avilutte viluttasaññī vippavasati, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.45: Nissaggiyaṃ cīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.52: chārattaṃ vippavasitvā puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.53: antochārattaṃ paccuddharati, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, ḍayhati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
